about.title: About Mettyerng
about.subtitle: Recognizing the importance of protecting and improving the living standards, employment and business opportunities of self-employed and self-employed workers, technical experts, service workers and other business practitioners both domestically and internationally, <<Our Friends Association>> was established by a group of young people under the motto <<Friendship, Solidarity, Loyalty>> on December 27, 2022 with the goal

mission.title: Mission
mission.desc1: To build a strong and prosperous Khmer community through quality education, preservation of traditional culture, and mutual support with a spirit of love.
mission.desc2: We work to improve the lives of Cambodians and encourage youth to pursue education and uphold excellent values.

vision.title: Vision
vision.desc1: To become a leading organization in building a strong Khmer community where education is accessible, culture is preserved, and society is supportive.
vision.desc2: We envision a community where all children have the opportunity to receive an education and youth are encouraged to preserve national culture.

values.title: Values
values.description: These core values guide our work in building the community.

love.title: ការស្រឡាញ់
love.description: We believe that love and care for one another are the essential foundation for building a strong community.

education.title: ការអប់រំ
education.description: Education is the most crucial foundation for development and building a bright future.

culture.title: វប្បធម៌
culture.description: Preserving and promoting the glorious Khmer traditional culture for future generations.

unity.title: ការរួបរួម
unity.description: Unity in building the community and helping one another.

innovation.title: ភាពច្នៃប្រឌិត
innovation.description: Initiating new ideas and creative thinking to solve social problems.

responsibility.title: ការទទួលខុសត្រូវ
responsibility.description: Responsibility towards the community and working with integrity.

timeline.title: Journey
timeline.description: Tracing our growth and achievements since 2018.

founded.title: ការបង្កើតក្រុម
founded.description: Mettyerng was formed by an initial group of 10 dedicated volunteers.

education.title: ការអប់រំ
education.description: Launched a project to provide education to children in rural areas.

covid.title: ជំនួយកូវីដ
covid.description: Provided food and medical aid during the COVID-19 pandemic.

haircut.title: គម្រោងកាត់សក់
haircut.description: Started a project to provide free haircuts to the community.

expansion.title: ការរីកចម្រើន
expansion.description: Expanded activities to other provinces and increased membership.

recognition.title: ការទទួលស្គាល់
recognition.description: Received recognition from the government and civil society for our forums.

newFuture.title: អនាគតថ្មី
newFuture.description: Launched a new website and expanded activities into the digital technology sphere.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: The core members who have dedicated themselves to building our community.

hero.title: Community Builders
hero.subtitle: Building Stronger Communities Together
hero.description: We are a group of social enthusiasts focused on education, culture, and community development
hero.projectDescription: Free haircuts for community members in need
hero.educationDescription: Promoting education and preserving Khmer culture

home.achievementsDesc: Through the dedication of our volunteers, we have achieved success in various fields
home.missionDesc: We are a group of social enthusiasts created to help communities through education, culture, and social development.
home.missionText: We believe that education is the most important foundation for development and building a bright future for Cambodian children and youth.
home.focusAreasDesc: We focus on building communities through these key areas
home.joinDesc: Become part of positive change, participate in building a strong community
home.educationDesc: Providing quality education to children and youth in the community
home.cultureDesc: Preserving and promoting traditional Khmer culture
home.educatedChildren: Children and youth who received education

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.subtitle: Discover our impactful projects and community initiatives

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch for collaboration, participation, or any questions
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject

footer.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to receive our latest news and activities
